entries.meaning: Characterised by marked or exaggerated movement of the wrist; involving deft wrist movements.
examples: I walked Jane down to the drive and watched her as she reversed, admiring her wristy gear changes.

Elle's grasped the front of his chinos, her fingers closing around his cock and Jackson jerked back  […]  After two days of sexual torment, his cock was on a hairtrigger, but that didn't mean he wanted a wristy on a hilltop.
